text:
SSL_TLS_SNI currently does not appear in any documentation.

2.2.12 was when SNI was added to http.

line 1135 httpd-2.2.12/modules/ssl/ssl_engine_kernel.c
line 1141 in http-2.2.23
line 1133 httpd-2.4.3

should be here.

http://httpd.apache.org/docs/2.4/mod/mod_ssl.html#envvars
creator: daniel.subs@internode.on.net
humbedooh@apache.org
